about.title: About Dopamind
about.tagline: AI companion designed specifically for ADHD and busy minds

mission.title: 🎯 Our Mission
mission.description:
Dopamind AI is an AI companion designed specifically for ADHD and busy minds. Manage tasks, find your focus, and take control of your life—just by chatting.

Feeling disorganized, struggling to start, and constantly procrastinating? It wasn't until I was diagnosed with ADHD a few years ago that I realized my distractibility wasn't my fault. I tried every productivity app out there, but endless lists and complicated steps only made me more anxious. They weren't designed for how our brains work.

My name is Philo. To help myself and everyone struggling like me, I poured my heart and soul into creating Dopamind AI. This isn't just another cold tool; it's a warm, supportive AI companion. You can talk to it like a friend, hand over your chaos, and it will understand and support you, never judge you.

features.title: ✨ How Dopamind AI Helps
features.clear_mind:
• Clear Your Mind, Just by Chatting
Capture fleeting thoughts anytime with your voice or text. Just say, "remind me to buy milk tomorrow afternoon," and it's scheduled. Never let a great idea or a to-do slip away again.
features.crush_procrastination:
• Crush Procrastination with AI
Feeling overwhelmed by a huge task? Let the AI automatically break it down into small, manageable steps. Conquering procrastination is as simple as starting the first step.
features.find_flow:
• Find Your Flow with "Vibe Working"
Our unique method combines an immersive, distraction-free Focus Mode with continuous AI encouragement, helping you effortlessly enter a state of deep work.
features.life_copilot:
• Your Life Co-pilot for a Busy Mind
Dopamind helps you track subscriptions to avoid surprise charges and acts as your smart fridge manager to say goodbye to expired food. It understands our unique pain points.
features.visualize_progress:
• Visualize Your Progress, Fuel Your Motivation
From task progress to habit check-ins, Dopamind uses visual heatmaps and data to build a positive dopamine loop. Your hard work is made visible, providing a constant source of achievement.

personal_note.title: 💪 Personal Note
personal_note.description:
While building Dopamind, my own daily effective work time increased by 200%. Without it, this app wouldn't exist.

I believe the ADHD mind holds incredible potential. My hope is that Dopamind AI can give every mind fighting distraction the wings it needs to soar. Whether you're a student, a freelancer, or just starting your career, Dopamind is here for you.

contact.title: 📧 Contact Us
contact.description: We greatly value user feedback and suggestions. If you have any questions, suggestions, or want to share your user experience, please feel free to contact us.

section1.title: AI-Powered Task Planning

Support for multiple languages and natural speech patterns
Hands-free operation perfect for ADHD users
Smart categorization based on voice content
